definitions.definition: To come or be in sight; to be in view; to become visible.

definitions.example: A great writer appeared at that time.

definitions.definition: To stand in presence of some authority, tribunal, or superior person, to answer a charge, plead a cause, etc.; to present oneself as a party or advocate before a court, or as a person to be tried.
To become visible to the apprehension of the mind; to be known as a subject of observation or comprehension, or as a thing proved; to be obvious or manifest.
To seem; to have a certain semblance; to look.
definitions.example: He appeared quite happy with the result.
